column4: developing for web on desktop 12.04 should be the same on server 12.04 as long as I keep both boxes up to date right?
why switch?  check out starting from !mini - you get LOTS of options for installing ubuntu
not switching, but if I am developing on desktop then push up to server of same version. should be cake right?
ya (sorry misunderstood your intentions).  they should almost be identical!
